title: NYC Buildings Chief Resigns as Prosecutors Examine Gambling Ties
description: Eric Ulrich, a former city councilman under investigation from Manhattan prosecutors, resigned on Thursday from his post as commissioner of the cityâ€™s Buildings Department.
dc:creator: William K. Rashbaum, Jeffery C. Mays and Jonah E. Bromwich
media:credit: Stephanie Keith for The New York Times
media:description: Eric Ulrich resigned a day after he met with prosecutors from the office of the Manhattan district attorney.
